pr_title: Rename type to resourceType and set type="text". This field is requir…

timeline.message: Rename type to resourceType and set type="text". This field is required as is in app.

timeline.bodyText:
You should be able to leave the enum as Type, since the Jackson JSON serializer will use the resourceType field in the class below as the name.
I'm fine with changing it as well, though.
timeline.author: karepker

replies.bodyText: I would like to keep field name and type name consistent if possible. Thanks!
replies.author: kuoyuchi
